Utilities

Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utilities.Question

  • public class Question
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an object, question It has the text that it contains, an amount of points, if it is endorsed or not, a timestamp, a creation username, a userid, an id, the topic it belongs to
    Author:
    sae1

      • Question

        public Question()
        A constructor to make a new question from the app

      • Question

        public Question(java.lang.String questionDescription,
                java.lang.String studentRating,
                java.lang.String questionTitle,
                java.lang.String creationTime,
                java.util.ArrayList<Reply> replies,
                java.lang.String ownerID,
                java.lang.String username,
                java.lang.Boolean endorsed,
                Topics parent,
                java.lang.String questionID)
        Constructor for a question object
        Parameters:
        questionDescription - the actual quesiton text
        studentRating - the number of upvotes it has
        questionTitle - the title of the question
        creationTime - when the question was made
        replies - the replies that relate to a question
        ownerID - the user id of the person who wrote the question
        username - the username of the person who wrote the question
        endorsed - if the question is endorsed by a teacher or TA
        parent - the topic that it corresponds to
        questionID - the id of this quesiton
